thread.title: Google Plans to Unveil Its Version of ‘Instant Articles’ Next Week
thread.title_full: Google Plans to Unveil Its Version of ‘Instant Articles’ Next Week

title: Google Plans to Unveil Its Version of ‘Instant Articles’ Next Week
text: Print Page by: Mark Bergen | re/code Three weeks ago, we told you about plans Google was hatching to launch a publishing tool to serve up articles on mobile devices. It would look similar to Facebook’s Instant Articles feature, only Google would cull articles from cached versions on search, rather than hosting it themselves, and would release it as an open source tool to other platforms. Its first big platform partner was Twitter.
